comments:
The bug occurs in the I200703301651 build. 

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create Web 2.5 project with default settings. 
2. After "finishing" the wizard the project is created, but an error dialog pops up. The exception is:

Carl can you repro this?   is this blocking?

I grabbed the latest & greatest - wtp-sdk-S-2.0M6-200704050411 - and I can't get this to happen.  Do you have any more detailed steps?  (I tried only a JEE 5 Web project, one created w/ an EAR, and one created w/ Web Doclet, JPA, and Java 6.0)
Can you recreate this with a later build?
The bug is no more reproducible with the 2.0M6-200704060120 build.
